Name: Daybreak at Last
QuestDesc: After resolving the crisis of TD outbreak, you and Jiyan returned to Jinzhou...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See? How lively! You really need to come and see it in person for the full effect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And that's thanks to your efforts, Wenshu.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I'm just doing my job. I should be the one thanking you. After all, without the Midnight Rangers tirelessly guarding the front lines, the <ano=sports games>Riverside Games</ano> wouldn't be possible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't always be so tense. Sometimes, you have to give yourself a breather. It's not good to push yourself too hard. So, how about picking up an event to participate in?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wenshu... Thank you, but you don't have to pitch me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why not? Go enjoy your youth! I would've rushed to sign up if I was still young.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, it's good to see you here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! I guess you must be the Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice to meet you! I'm the director of the Riverside Games. You can call me Wenshu.

Options.PlotLineKey: Thank you for the invite, Wenshu.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, I almost dropped the ball on this one. I would've forgotten to send out those invitations without Jiyan's reminder.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not worth mentioning, Wenshu. This is the first Riverside Games in many years, and you must have been busy with various matters. I only offered a little help when I could.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, it's a slow day today. Please, take a break and have some fun.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right. Go participate in the event, you two! That's how you enjoy your day off!

Options.PlotLineKey: You mean I can participate too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! The Jinzhou Riverside Games is an event for all people to enjoy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed. I'm looking forward to your performance, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only a few events specifically require participants to be Resonators. Other than that, there are no special restrictions for any event.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We haven't held the Riverside Games in years. Look at him, Jiyan still remembers the rules better than I do. Who would've thought?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: During the preparation, I came across some pictures from past Games and instantly felt a rush of adrenaline. Ah, the memories of my youth...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a pity that the Midnight Rangers are always on the front lines, getting ready for emergencies. The Riverside Games is their only chance to relax and have some fun.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I suggest looking around for events to join if you're interested. Many of them are open to on-site registration.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to confirm the safety of the surroundings before the race begins. You can consult Wenshu should you need any assistance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Have a great time, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh well, I didn't invite him over for that. I hoped he'd come and relax, not to find a new place to work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On the other hand, we couldn't have brought the situation at the borders under control without Jiyan's prudence...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, I'm getting off track. The Gulpuff Relay is about to start, and I have to go to the scene in case anything happens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Especially those still warming up in the backup lane. Gotta bring them over.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, are you coming with me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At the Riverside Games, you gather details from Jiyan and Wenshu as you prepare to assist with the event.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changfeng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, you're our top runner. You should go first and motivate us. Make the other teams sweat. Throw them off their game!

Dialogues.Speaker: Hanbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... I don't think that's the best tactic. Remember that team from ten years ago?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changfeng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, the record-breaking team?

Dialogues.Speaker: Hanbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yep, it's them. Apparently their plan was to act weak in the beginning and then have their final runner blow past everyone else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changfeng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's nonsense! What if we lag far behind and can't catch up again? All our efforts will be in vain!

Dialogues.Speaker: Changfeng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you {PlayerName}? You gonna participate in the Gulpuff Relay too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changfeng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, you haven't heard?

Dialogues.Speaker: Hanbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the best part of the Riverside Games. Four people on each team race Gulpuff Echoes in the water lanes. It's pretty intense!

Dialogues.Speaker: Hanbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And we're just figuring out our relay order. Open to suggestions!

Dialogues.Speaker: Hanbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've trained for the longest time. Changfeng and the others are all pretty evenly matched. What do you think—should I lead off or bring it home as anchor?

Options.PlotLineKey: You should go first to intimidate the opponents!
You should go last and take over the lead.
Can't you just go all out at once?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changfeng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See! {PlayerName}'s on my side! So it's been decided!

Dialogues.Speaker: Hanbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, okay! If you say so, I believe I can do it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Changfeng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, don't be silly! It's a relay! Anyway, thanks for the joke. It definitely helped calm my nerves a bit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll win and we'll break the record! You hear me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Everyone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't hear you! LOUDER! DO YOU HEAR ME!

Dialogues.Speaker: Everyone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: YEAH!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, if this isn't the very important guest of Jinzhou! Thanks for rooting for us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry for being loud. But you gotta admit, sometimes a strong voice is needed to show our determination. Right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I saw another team preparing for the race just now, but they seem to have run into some problem.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wenshu just rushed over there. I hope they're okay!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, the race is about to start. We need to do a final warm-up. Remember to cheer for us, okay?

Chapters.Title: Talk to the players on the spare track

Dialogues.Speaker: Troubled Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh... All those hours of training for nothing. We're doomed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Calm Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't give up yet. We've still got some time before the relay starts!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lingyan, Ganquan, what's wrong?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, Wenshu! And this is...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect timing! We're have a bit of a situation right now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Two of our teammates accidentally injured themselves during warm-up... Luckily, the wounds weren't too bad, but the doctor said that they wouldn't be able to participate in the relay anytime soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've asked the organizing committee. Said we can still participate with temporary teammates.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the relay is starting soon. It's impossible to find another person to join us, not to mention two...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sigh... First our captain had to quit because of some family emergency, and now this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh. Are we supposed to just wait for the next Riverside Games? Who knows when that will be...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of which... Do you have a team, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName} is also a Resonator. {Male=He's;Female=She's} fully qualified for the Gulpuff Relay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still... it depends on whether {Male=he;Female=she} would like to join you.

Options.PlotLineKey: What kind of competition is it, then?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's simple! Four people take turns controlling a Gulpuff in a relay race. The first team to reach the finish line wins.

Options.PlotLineKey: What can I get out of this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much! If we can get the prize money, we'll definitely split it with you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even if we don't rank, we'll treat you to a big feast in Jinzhou to thank you for doing us such a big favor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right! We'll buy you the best barbecue in Jinzhou. That place is everyone's favorite!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then you're only one person short for the relay. I know a good candidate for that...

Options.PlotLineKey: Is it the person I'm thinking of?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wh-who?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bingo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! Why didn't I think of him!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Are you serious? The general doesn't look like he'd be interested in events like this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, there's more to your general than you know. That's all I can say.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you mean?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Instead of asking questions here, why don't you just go and invite him?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't have the guts...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go invite him now, and you may still have a chance to get him onboard. Don't let others take your chance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're counting on you, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You find out that two members of Lingyan and Ganquan's team are injured and unable to race. To fill the gap, you join the team, but you still need one more member. After discussing it with Wenshu, you both agree that Jiyan is the best fit, so you decide to invite him to join.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, what are you doing here? Have you found any event that you're interested in?

Options.PlotLineKey: Yes, but I've run into a bit of trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Trouble? If you're comfortable sharing, tell me about it. Maybe I can help.

Options.PlotLineKey: Actually, I do need your help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... you want me to join the relay as your temporary teammate?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The key to winning a relay race lies in mutual understanding, cooperation, and trust among team members.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Most of the teams are formed according to the Midnight Rangers units they belong to. Therefore, they're familiar with their teammates and have good teamwork.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I believe you can find a better candidate for your team. That candidate doesn't have to be me.

Options.PlotLineKey: But we'll be disqualified without another teammate.
I really want to join the race with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Disqualification for teams without enough participants... Yes, I remember that rule. I imagine your teammates would be greatly disappointed if that happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Joining you... I see. It might be fun.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But given we never trained together before, it may prove challenging to win.

Options.PlotLineKey: Doesn't matter, we're a last-minute temporary team anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A temporary team...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm fine, thank you for asking... It's been a long time since I last heard that phrase.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed. No need to worry about the end result before the competition begins.

Options.PlotLineKey: The team would be thrilled to have you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... I'll join you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Spectators are gathering along the lanes. The race should start soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go join our new teammates.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nothing... Perhaps it's just my imagination.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You invite Jiyan to join the team. He agrees to be a substitute after careful consideration.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... You managed to rope the general in?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, General Jiyan, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName} has told me what happened. I will join you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hooray! Now we can join the race! With General Jiyan and {PlayerName} on our side, maybe we can even aim for a new record!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not to be the party pooper here, but as a last-minute team, we probably won't hit the record. Unless...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unless what?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh, sorry, forget about it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ten years ago, a team set the record in the Gulpuff Relay race. That record remains unbeaten to this day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since then, every time the Games are held, a major highlight is whether the record will be broken.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah! I really wanted to learn from their strategy, but the video of that race got borrowed and never returned. Bummer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They set the record. They must have trained together for a long time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well we're a temporary team. Wouldn't have been able to learn much from it anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Keep your chin up. Your hard work will pay off.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not to mention the team you were talking about was a temporary team, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, so even General Jiyan has heard of that race!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. That was a... good race.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it's been ten years... I wonder how that team's doing now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should worry about ourselves first... There's not much time left, and we haven't even decided the relay order.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, the relay order... It used to be decided by the captain...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then... General, can you decide it for us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you have trained together extensively, I trust you can decide the order better than me. I will gladly cooperate to the best of my abilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright... in that case, I think Ganquan would be perfect as the first runner!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me... the first? Seriously?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've always been the first runner during our training. Surely you'll make a good start!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The first runner doesn't need to coordinate with the two of us; he only needs to exchange the controller with Lingyan. It's a safe arrangement indeed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whew—I'll do my best.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... As for General Jiyan and {PlayerName}, I think...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General, can you be the connecting third runner? Since you're familiar with both {PlayerName} and us Midnight Rangers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A reasonable strategy. I agree.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then the relay order would be me first, followed by Lingyan, then General Jiyan, and {PlayerName} last.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, this is your first race, and you may receive plenty of attention as the last runner. Please stay calm and relax.

Options.PlotLineKey: Butterflies are fighting in my stomach.
Prepare to be surprised when I win the race.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm glad to hear that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once I arrive at the exchange zone, go for the goal and don't look back. I'll take care of the rest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've always trusted your capabilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Any other questions?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our team doesn't have a name yet!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since {PlayerName} brought this team together, maybe we should let {Male=him;Female=her} decide the name.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good, it sounds easy to remember.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm starting to crave some buffalo wings too...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not bad. It helps to release the tension.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We can have this as the team name, though I wouldn't call myself a genius.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Considering your character, I was expecting something... different.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nevertheless, it is a good name. I have no objection.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The name is settled, then. Everyone, please get ready in your designated exchange zones.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We can stay in touch with our Terminals once the race begins.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jiyan gives a pep talk before the race. You learn that the fastest race record was set by a temporary team a decade ago. You finalize your team name and relay order.

Chapters.Title: Go to the handoff area to prepare for the match

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, are you all right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry for what just happened. You almost reached the finish line, and then...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, did you notice anything unusual before?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An unfamiliar voice briefly interrupted our team's channel...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wenshu, let's evacuate the spectators now. Send them back to the city in batches.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand, but most of the teams are waiting to start their race, and it's our first Riverside Games in years. Ending it early may spoil their fun.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The voice you mentioned... Could it be our spectators cheering?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When {PlayerName} asked me to team up with {Male=him;Female=her}, I heard something similar by the racing lane.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have requested the monitoring data records of all nearby waterways from the Academy for safety measures.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. I thought the Gulpuffs were just frightened...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There might be an underlying cause of this unusual behavior.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The records will take some more time to download. Evacuate the people first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I trust your decision, but...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A man somehow ended up riding a Gulpuff when it all happened, and he seemed to really enjoy it. Now, other people are eager to give it a try too...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They all seem super excited... I guess it will take some time to evacuate them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Get that person to leave first, and the others should follow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wenshu, I'm going with you.

Options.PlotLineKey: Anything I can help you with?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! Rover, you are respected by many. If you're willing to help us calm people down, it will making things easier for sure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The race is halted due to a disruptive incident. Jiyan points out something strange. But before investigating, you need to evacuate the spectators for their own safety.

Dialogues.Speaker: Calm Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard we must all go back to the city now. For real?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, because there is a security risk. We are here to escort you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Say sike! I was hoping to snap a few more pics of that guy on the Gulpuff...

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ohh! You must be the runner in the lead just now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a pity they just suspended the race... I was really excited to see your performance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You looked so cool! See, I've even got a video clip of you!

Options.PlotLineKey: Thank you, please do more of these.
Thank you, but please don't bother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure I will! My camera only captures the best moments!

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? Do you not like it? Looks pretty good to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, let's hurry up and leave here, shall we?

Dialogues.Speaker: Calm Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please excuse us. My sister's never been to the Riverside Games before. She's super into photography, so she may have gotten a little carried away talking about her work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So we're really not doing it anymore? Can't we try to find another way?

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I still have more than half of my camera's memory left...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sure the board of coordinators will find a way to hold it again on a later date. Now, please return to the city for your safety.

Dialogues.Speaker: Calm Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright. Let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, fine. At least I've got two wonderful photos now! One of the famous Rover taking over the lead, and another with a guy on a Gulpuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way! Can I enter your photo in a contest? Like, is it okay for you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's great! I'm pretty sure it's gonna be an award-winning entry! I'll give you a half of my prize money!

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay then... I'll just submit the other photo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can I stay a little longer please? I want to watch the full race.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The race is over now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, {PlayerName}. Here's the thing. This kid won't let me take her home.

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I came here by myself!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you see, that's the problem. She managed to sneak in here. We are trying to get in touch with her parents.

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please don't call mommy. She'll be upset at me.

Options.PlotLineKey: If it makes her upset, why did you sneak out?

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... I...

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I came here to see daddy. He won the silver medal in the last race!

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I haven't seen him for a long, long time, so I thought maybe I can find him here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The last relay? That was three years ago. What's your father's name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Kongwen!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh... It's him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you know my daddy?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. We were stationed in the same camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! Can you take me to Daddy's place?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh, well, he's... busy! Like, super, super busy! So he's not here today...

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know! Mommy said he's fighting monsters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, he's out there fighting now. I'll ask your dad to give you a call.

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really!

Options.PlotLineKey: Yes, but we need you to go home first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can't lie to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never lie!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover is the witness. Pinkies!

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pinkies!

Dialogues.Speaker: Polite Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganquan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll take her home first. Rover, we're counting on you to handle the rest.

Chapters.Title: Ask the audience assaulted by Gulpuff

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sir, please calm down and stop talking about riding Gulpuffs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Excited Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But that was really fun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May I have your hand?

Dialogues.Speaker: Excited Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What... What's wrong?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nothing major. I just need to confirm something.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As I expected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Excited Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? When did I get hurt? I didn't feel it at all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The adrenaline from excitement may have dampened your sensitivity to pain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, your nervous response betrays your condition. You right hand has been shaking involuntarily, likely because the wound has been left untreated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fortunately, it's not caused by the Gulpuffs. Please take this to relieve the pain for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Excited Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ouch... It's really starting to hurt now that you've mentioned it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright. Have you calmed down now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Excited Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry. I got a little carried away... Sorry again for the trouble I've caused.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go have someone see to your wound.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, fancy seeing you here.

Options.PlotLineKey: Jiyan and I are joining the relay race together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't want to spoil your fun, but I'm afraid we need to suspend the race for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can you fill us in on the data?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I checked the monitoring data as you asked, and I found unusual fluctuations near the upper waters to the north.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why didn't the nearest Beacon pick up on this anomaly?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Resonance Beacon is functioning properly, but we still don't know why it didn't issue a warning this time. I will investigate this further at a later time.

Options.PlotLineKey: Is it related to the Gulpuffs' strange behaviors?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Animals are often the first to detect signs of danger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tacet Discords are similar to animals in this regard. They're very sensitive to any change in the frequencies in their surroundings. That's why those Gulpuffs went haywire.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I suppose that's why you asked me to check the monitoring data for you, Jiyan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The timing of this change is concerning. Why did it happen precisely during the Riverside Games?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps the Riverside Games' frequency resonated with something in the upper waters?

Options.PlotLineKey: Let's go check out the upper waters now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. Let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The lack of perceivable warning signs typically suggests unknown risks. Jiyan, {PlayerName}, stay safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once the injured are safe, you and Jiyan learn from Mortefi that the manic Gulpuffs were affected by abnormal frequency fluctuations upstream. The timing of this accident strikes Jiyan as suspicious, so you decide to investigate upstream.

Chapters.Title: Go to the Abnormal Location upstream

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cravings
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't... Come near me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Discords are increasing. Let's take them down first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the Retroact Rain... We need to hurry up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cravings
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Let's participate... Together...

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cravings
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Help... help me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The voices are coming from here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cravings
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I don't want...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It might be trying to tell us something... We need to decipher the message somehow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The rain is getting worse. If this persists, we will likely have to face a minor TD Outbreak.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I have your back. Stay focused on analyzing the voices.

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cravings
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You should relax... Weekend... Who knows when is the next... Let's go... Come on... Go... Takeover...

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cravings
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tacet Discords... They won't... No... I'm gonna... I can't... Help...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the cheers during the Riverside Games, mingled together with cries for help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps some people have been trapped in this place, or maybe...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, we have to figure it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is... the Jinzhou city?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes and no. Technically, it's a replica of the city made up of Remnant frequencies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A replica?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Simply put, it's an illusion made of memories. Scholars would call it a Sonoro Sphere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The environment here is ever-changing. One misstep and you may fall. Stay close to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are these the spectators we saw earlier?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No. They are memory projections from the previous Riverside Games.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't quite describe it, but something feels wrong with them. It's almost as if they are...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Merely soulless shells.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's keep moving.

Dialogues.Speaker: Whispering Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on! Are you seriously expecting teamwork among members of a temporary team?

Dialogues.Speaker: Regretful Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No wonder they made a mistake. Such a shame.

Options.PlotLineKey: A temporary team? Are they talking about us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the temporary team from a decade ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm fine. It brought back some memories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to Mortefi's speculation, this Sonoro Sphere was resonating with the Riverside Games' frequencies, and it led to the abnormal fluctuations we detected earlier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Whispering Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, look! Isn't that the temporary team? Their last runner is actually catching up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Surprised Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? He... He's in the lead now?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Whispering Audience
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That kid... I remember he's a new recruit! Impressive!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the Tacet Discords... Watch out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You enter the Sonoro Sphere with Jiyan and find illusions discussing the temporary team from ten years ago. Jiyan seems to know the story but chooses to avoid the subject. Then, before you can act, the illusions turn into Tacet Discords and attack.

Options.PlotLineKey: So those spectators were Tacet Discords too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They seem to be playing a game of imitation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those are nothing but empty shells, no matter how lifelike they may seem.

Options.PlotLineKey: But why are they reenacting the Riverside Games from a decade ago?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All of this... I have a feeling it all ties back to the temporary team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I rarely ever mentioned it, but ten years ago, I was a part of that temporary team. Back then...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the Knell Square's bell.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry. I'm here with you... We'll go see for ourselves.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jiyan explains these Tacet Discords are reenacting the Riverside Games from a decade ago and reveals he was a member of that record-breaking team. He believes the anomalies are linked to them. You hear the Knell Square's bell and continue exploring.

Dialogues.Speaker: Voice in the Mist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Damn these monsters! Will they ever stop—

Dialogues.Speaker: Voice in the Mist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stay focused. This is not a game.

Dialogues.Speaker: Voice in the Mist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch out... Don't let your guard down...

Dialogues.Speaker: Voice in the Mist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Help... Help me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Voice in the Mist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: S-stay away from me... Ahhh!

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are too many of them... It's impossible...

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The reinforcement is here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... No! They're all dead! No one's coming for us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the remaining memory of the dead. We can't communicate with him.

Options.PlotLineKey: It seems he's reliving that day on the battlefield.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. Trapped inside his own memories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What on earth are they thinking? Why are we getting new recruits as reinforcements?

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're just kids. No way we're letting them on the battlefield like this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are all of our bases compromised, leaving us with no seasoned soldiers?

Options.PlotLineKey: Are these the memories from that past battle?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. The Tacet Discords devoured our fallen soldiers' frequencies to gain their memories...

Options.PlotLineKey: Why were the new recruits sent to the battlefield?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back then, we suffered simultaneous assaults on our defenses, and we had a critical shortage of troops. The situation was urgent, and we had to deploy our latest recruits as a last resort.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Many of us couldn't make it back...

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He does stand out among our new recruits, but he lacks experience on the front line.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And now our captain's asking us to listen to his commands? Can we really trust that kid?

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What are his plans for us now? Retreat or stand guard?

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have no choice! Jinzhou needs our protection! We must buy more time for our people... But how do we defend this place, and who's left to do so?

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ....You know, those who stay may not make it back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we must stay to hold the lines, count me in. We can't let those monsters take this place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But will our new captain make the right call in time?

Options.PlotLineKey: The new recruit they're talking about...
So... They stayed to hold the line?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. That was the right decision... For the greater good.

Options.PlotLineKey: That's why the Desorock Highland didn't fall.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes.

Chapters.Title: Head to the center of the Hall

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The fog is thickening. Stay alert.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Be careful of the Tacet Discords, {PlayerName}.

Options.PlotLineKey: Where on earth are these voices coming from...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A decade ago, shortly after the conclusion of the previous Riverside Games, a sudden TD Outbreak struck the Desorock Highland.

Options.PlotLineKey: So the voices are from that past battle?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... The Midnight Rangers had to send its latest recruits to the frontline because of the situation's urgency.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end, we contained the outbreak at a heavy price...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The battle took countless lives... Our victory was overshadowed by the immeasurable loss.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And they were not the only ones who lost their lives in the Desorock Highland.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This Sonoro Sphere is probably made up of the <ano=lingering frequencies>Reverberations</ano> they left behind.

Options.PlotLineKey: How did the TDs acquire their memories?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As Tacet Discords devoured the fallen soldiers' frequencies, they became convinced they were the soldiers they feasted upon... Now, they are just reenacting what happened in "their" memories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it seems the remaining frequencies of our soldiers are still resisting.

Options.PlotLineKey: They don't want to become one those monsters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... The Tacet Discords are merging together. This will endanger more civilian lives if we allow it to occur.

Options.PlotLineKey: The deceased soldiers led us here to stop them?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It would seem so.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the bell. They must be showing the way for us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jiyan speculates that the Sonoro Sphere is composed of the Reverberations of his late comrades who have been trapped here and forced to relive their memories. Their frequencies are stuck in a past battle against the Tacet Discords and they implore you for help. Guided by the bell, you venture further in the Sonoro.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Discords should be aware of our presence now. They'll be harder to deal with.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Brace yourself for the fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The atmosphere is thick and dangerous...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's take down these Murmurins first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to what we've learned, this battle happened a decade ago. Why are they only calling out to us now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think... It's because of you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me? But I didn't even know them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was wondering why this year of all times... When the Riverside Games had been held before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And you are the only variable here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You invited me to join your temporary team so Ganquan and Lingyan can still participate in the race.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We initially fell behind, but later reclaimed the lead... It's like a deja vu of the race from a decade ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And that's what triggered the resonance...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The fallen soldiers... They must have held on to those memories dearly. That's how they resisted merging with the Tacet Discords...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... They have been silently fighting for us all these years, or we would've faced a TD Outbreak...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: During that past battle in Desorock Highland, did you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... We fought together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They probably didn't want it to happen again. All those deaths and losses...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...And so they called out to us for help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's move on, {PlayerName}.

Chapters.Title: Use the Grapple to reach the upper-levels
Use the Grapple to reach the corridor

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The bell is right ahead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is it... Knell Square ahead?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go.

Chapters.Title: Reach the end of the corridor

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Nonsense!

Options.PlotLineKey: What on earth are they doing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They are reenacting our first lesson for new recruits...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: During their first lesson, new recruits must pay tribute to fallen soldiers in Knell Square.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We are required to do this before being allowed on the battlefield.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Its significance eluded most of us during initial training, myself included. Until that day...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... I didn't attend the memorial that day, but that was when I finally realized...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Knell Square... It is the place where our career as soldiers begins and ends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These monsters will never fathom the weight of their sacrifices.

Options.PlotLineKey: Jiyan... Let's go bid them farewell one last time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jiyan is struck by how the Tacet Discords are mimicking the Midnight Rangers' tribute to fallen soldiers, finding it absurd as these monsters shouldn't have been able to understand the ceremony's meaning. As the bell rings again, the Tacet Discords move slowly towards the fog. You and Jiyan are ready to bid them a proper farewell.

Chapters.Title: Reach the bottom of the building

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cries for Help
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Help... Help me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Unknown Cries for Help
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... Go away...

Chapters.Title: Reach the bottom of the building

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Please... Can't let this one pass... Let's go together...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry... I made a mistake...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...champion...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...We trust you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry... We have Jiyan on our side...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He's Jiyan! Of course he can...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The command... Go... There's no time...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We are leaving it to you... Jiyan...

Dialogues.Speaker: Muffled Voices
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll do it together again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I'm fine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They've been trapped here for ten years, and now finally free. I hope they're in a better place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What happened here goes far beyond what we know about the Waveworn Phenomena so far...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've sampled some of the frequencies here with my Terminal. We should deliver the sample to the Academy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...We're no longer seeing any unusual fluctuations now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good job. You should have successfully prevented a potential TD Outbreak.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you requested, I compared the fluctuations with those of the previous Outbreaks, and I did spot some similarities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Mortefi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm not done yet. Thank me later if you must.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though there are some similarities, they aren't identical. I'm no expert in this field, and I can't give you any definitive conclusions yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the frequency sample I've recorded.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Frequency sample from a Sonoro Sphere... I'll deliver it to a colleague. It's in better hands with her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's someone you know. Baizhi. She specializes in Ecoacoustic research, and the Sonoro Sphere is her field of expertise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... Whatever you do, please keep it safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What now, you don't trust me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I trust you as always, Mortefi. But this sample... It means a lot to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rest assured. You should know how careful we are with our samples... Especially such a valuable one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This should be our wake-up call. The Waveworn Phenomena is more complicated than we thought.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a wake-up call, and it may also hold the answers we've been searching for all these years.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, the Riverside Games people were looking for you, Jiyan. Probably wanted to discuss holding the event again at a later date.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure, I'll go talk to them once everything is settled here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, if there's nothing else, I'm going back to my lab.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, there is a place I need to visit. Could you come with me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. I need to pick up something first. See you at Knell Square.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure. I'll be waiting for you at Knell Square.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jiyan gives Mortefi the recorded frequency samples, and Mortefi promises the Academy will use them well.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There is something I wish to do with you today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A seed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the seed of a resilient type of flower, which I asked the Academy to help me breed years ago.

Options.PlotLineKey: Did you plant all these flowers here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From here, you can see all of Jinzhou city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I thought... those who died for Jinzhou would want to see how it's thriving now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This flower... We named it the Emortia.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. The word represents both "departure" and "return."

Options.PlotLineKey: So the departed soldiers can one day return home...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. I know there's nothing we can do to bring them back, but for us still living, we need something like this to hold on to.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}, for finally bringing them peace. Now, they no longer have to fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And this is why I believe you should be the one to plant this seed here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You accept the seed. Despite its size, it feels heavy in your hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Together with Jiyan, you plant it. Perhaps one day, you'll watch the sunset again, with the flower you planted by your side.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have prevented one Outbreak for the time being.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But a greater danger remains lurking in the darkness... Our knowledge of it is severely lacking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I must act to prevent more deaths...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for your concern.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every Midnight Ranger is prepared to die on the battlefield any day. I know this all too well as their general in command.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Helping the souls of our fallen ones return to their homeland... This is one of the few ways I can honor their sacrifices.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I have one more request.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If one day I perish in battle and cannot return home... Could you please plant one of these flowers for me?

Options.PlotLineKey: I will not let you die.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At Knell Square, you see the flowers Jiyan planted for the fallen soldiers. Together, you plant an "Emortia" seed, hoping the souls you met in the Sonoro find peace and return home. Jiyan asks you to plant an Emortia for him if he cannot return home someday.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I heard you've returned to the city with General Jiyan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, what a relief. I am beyond happy to know you're all safe and sound.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There is something I forgot to give you. Let's meet up somewhere when you have the time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see those fish? They look so happy in the safety of their pond.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Happiness and safety often come at a cost, whether it be for fish or people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if we do not feel the weight of that price, someone else is carrying it for us.

Options.PlotLineKey: What happened to that temporary team ten years ago?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ten years... How time flies. I coordinated the Riverside Games that year, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dozens of teams competed that day, and the race lasted well into the afternoon... The sunset was so beautiful, like what we're seeing now... It was so tranquil.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That team was thrown together last minute, and nobody thought they could win. They even stumbled during their first exchange.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But then, the team surprised everyone with their final runner's expert Gulpuff handling and victorious finish. It was truly a race to remember.

Options.PlotLineKey: They must have been overjoyed to win.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. I still remember how excited those kids looked...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like how you looked in this photo.

Options.PlotLineKey: Is this a group photo of us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We were worried. We weren't going to get a photo of you all together... Luckily, the photographer managed to capture a shot of the whole team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should thank you for bringing that team together, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm planning to talk to Jiyan about hosting the Riverside Games another time. If all goes well, please join us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wenshu shares the full story of the temporary team and gives you a photo of you and Jiyan's team as a keepsake.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see those fish? They look so happy in the safety of their pond.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Happiness and safety often come at a cost, whether it be for fish or people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if we do not feel the weight of that price, someone else is carrying it for us.

Options.PlotLineKey: What happened to that temporary team ten years ago?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wenshu
